content: hermione toad s everyday hat @chit chat knits hermione toad s everyday hat was made to match hermione s everyday mitts by erica lueder the hat was designed for the crafting with the toads triwizarding tournament @toadhollownj com the hat has a fun simple to memorize pattern repeat it is a great knit for knitting while chatting with friends or binge watching gauge 5 5 stitches per inch 8 row per inch measure after blocking size adult medium materials dk weight yarn christmas at hogwarts abbreviations toad hollow s toad dk k knit p purl size 4 and size 6 co cast on bobble bind off 16 circular needles and size 6 dpns kfb knit front and back stitch marker skp slip one stitch knit wise knit one stitch darning needle pass slipped stitch over bor/eor beginning of round end of round sts stitches cast on 96 sts on size 4 needles and join in the round for more stretch use the german twisted cast on to prevent a gap cross first co stitch over last co stitch the first co stitch is now on the right hand needle and the last co stitch is on the left needle place a bor marker between the two sts ribbing work k1 p1 ribbing to eor repeat until ribbing measures 1¾ inches or to desired length
